changelog.name: Connection to Notion
changes: Implemented dynamic context loading system - reduces token usage by 50-60%
Added intelligent memory relevance scoring and keyword extraction
Created tiered memory system: Core Identity (always load) + Relevant Facts/Topics (query-based)
Reduced system prompt from 6,474 to 962 characters (85% reduction)
Switched to Claude Haiku 3 model for 92% cost savings
Added real-time cost tracking for each API request
Optimized context assembly to send only 15-25 facts instead of all 233
Total cost reduction: ~95% (from $0.024 to $0.002 per request)

changelog.name: Natural Memory Commands
changes: Expanded memory save triggers to accept casual language
Added patterns: 'keep in mind', 'make a note', 'don't forget', 'write down', 'store this', 'log that'
Users can now save to memory naturally without specific phrases
Improved pattern matching with 9 different trigger variations
Added validation to avoid saving questions or very short fragments

changelog.name: Smart Auto-Update
changes: Added automatic detection of newer memory files from GitHub
Auto-updates local memory if GitHub version is newer
Checks on startup and every 30 minutes
Prevents overwriting newer data with older data
Smart sync: pulls if GitHub is newer, pushes if local is current

changelog.name: Auto-Sync Enhancement
changes: Added conversational commands for GitHub memory sync
Implemented automatic memory sync every 30 minutes
Added 'Sync my memory to GitHub' voice command
Added 'Pull my memory from GitHub' voice command
Memory now auto-syncs to repository in background
